医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
人工智能通过新的受体模型推进精神健康疾病的药物发现人工智能 (AI) 可以帮助识别可作为治疗精神健康障碍新药的分子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/AI-advances-drug-discovery-for-mental-health-disorders-with-new-receptor-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/AI-advances-drug-discovery-for-mental-health-disorders-with-new-receptor-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f504c0ad-e647-4e0e-9efc-d36ae775cc39 Fri, 23 Aug 2024 15:34:58 -0400 AI advances drug discovery for mental health disorders with new receptor models
ZNRF3 基因缺陷会导致大脑大小相反和潜在的肿瘤风险一种名为 ZNRF3 的基因已知与癌症有关，也会扰乱大脑。人类大脑依靠该基因的两个副本来构建合适大小的大脑。如果其中一个副本有缺陷，大脑就会变得太小或太大（称为镜像效应），从而导致各种神经系统症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Defective-ZNRF3-gene-causes-oppositing-brain-sizes-and-pottial-tumor-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Defective-ZNRF3-gene-causes-oppositing-brain-sizes-and-potential-tumor-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e3ad948-c0e6-4cc9-86eb-2fb5cb967b8c Fri, 23 Aug 2024 15:29:20 -0400 Defective ZNRF3 gene causes opposing brain sizes and potential tumor risk
炎症性肠病并发症的内镜治疗进展炎症性肠病（IBD）包括克罗恩病（CD）和溃疡性结肠炎（UC），是影响胃肠道的慢性炎症性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Advances-in-endooscopy-treatment-for-itis-bowel-disease-complications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Advances-in-endooscopy-treatment-for-炎症-bowel-disease-complications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fbfc2638-57db-4290-bf8a-fc3b2b776291 Fri, 23 Aug 2024 15:21:24 -0400 Advances in endoscopic treatment for inflammatory bowel disease complications
研究揭示糖尿病并发症与心理健康障碍之间的双向关系心脏病、中风、神经损伤。这些只是数百万美国人糖尿病患者面临更大风险的一些并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Study-reveals-biorient-relationship- Between-diabetes-complications-and-mental-health-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Study-reveals-biorient-relationship- Between-diabetes-complications-and-mental-health-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=485dc055-6373-4e9c-9914-06439f14eb6b Fri, 23 Aug 2024 15:16:44 -0400 Study reveals bidirectional relationship between diabetes complications and mental health disorders
研究发现记忆线索可能有助于减少饮酒研究人员探索记忆在饮酒中的作用，认为它可以帮助人们减少饮酒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Memory-cues-may-help-reduce-alcohol-conspiration-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Memory-cues-may-help-reduce-alcohol-conspiration-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd4d2f39-69e9-40e2-8eb4-dab6f205175c Fri, 23 Aug 2024 15:04:18 -0400 Memory cues may help reduce alcohol consumption, study finds
研究发现同床不太可能损害儿童的心理健康新研究发现，父母同床不太可能影响儿童的心理发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Bed-sharing-is-unlikely-to-harm-childrens-psychological-health-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Bed-sharing-is-unlikely-to-harm-childrens-psychological-health-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1ee761c-96b3-4923-8e7a-b4e1aabb74d2 Fri, 23 Aug 2024 15:00:21 -0400 Bed-sharing is unlikely to harm children's psychological health, study finds
EEG 技术迎来 100 周年，未来创新前景广阔人类大脑的电活动首次被记录一百年后，专家们正在庆祝这一发现的遗产，并分享他们对其未来的预测和优先事项。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/EEG-technology-marks-100-years-with-promising-future-innovations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/EEG-technology-marks-100-years-with-promising-future-innovations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a000b916-f94b-4108-ae60-888448a68560 Fri, 23 Aug 2024 14:47:39 -0400 EEG technology marks 100 years with promising future innovations
创新药物通过抑制中性粒细胞活化减少大鼠炎症一种新开发的化合物可以减少由过度活跃的中性粒细胞引起的大鼠有害炎症，作为人类各种炎症性疾病的更安全的治疗方法显示出巨大的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Innovative-drug-reduces-inflammation-in-rats-by-inhibiting-neutropil-activation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Innovative-drug-reduces-inflammation-in-rats-by-inhibiting-neutropil-activation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90c3bdd2-7152-4955-b1f4-3acaf319a29f Fri, 23 Aug 2024 14:35:21 -0400 Innovative drug reduces inflammation in rats by inhibiting neutrophil activation
研究揭示大脑通路如何帮助受伤后运动恢复中风和脊髓损伤会严重损害运动功能，了解如何促进康复是一项严峻的挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Study-reveals-how-brain-pathways-aid-motor-recovery-after-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Study-reveals-how-brain-pathways-aid-motor-recovery-after-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09079ce0-7ed5-404f-b90d-61ca469d523e Fri, 23 Aug 2024 14:31:05 -0400 Study reveals how brain pathways aid motor recovery after injury
AmoyDx®泛肺癌PCR Panel在日本获批作为海一坦®片剂（古马龙替尼）的伴随诊断Riken Genesis Co., Ltd.、Amoy Diagnostics Co., Ltd.和Precision Medicine Asia Co., Ltd.今天宣布日本厚生劳动省已批准AmoyDx®泛肺癌PCR试剂盒https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/AmoyDxc2ae-Pan-Lung-Cancer-PCR-Panel-approved-in-Japan-as-a-companion-diagnostic-for-Haiyitanc2ae-tablets-(gumarontinib ).aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/AmoyDxc2ae-Pan-Lung-Cancer-PCR-Panel-approved-in-Japan-as-a-companion-diagnostic-for-Haiyitanc2ae-tablets-(gumarontinib ).aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a232d63-bef6-431a-bfb0-3966dadb80a7 Fri, 23 Aug 2024 07:18:00 -0400 AmoyDx® Pan Lung Cancer PCR Panel approved in Japan as a companion diagnostic for Haiyitan® tablets (gumarontinib)
